name: Crystal Catcher DEMO
description:
This is my first project I am releasing I have the main or core things down and at the point to where I want feedback before I go in and add more and make it bigger with more assets. 

alt+F4 to close game

W,A,S,D to move

Space to jump

Mouse to look 

Click to dash in the way you are looking (you can also bounce off of enemies when you dash into them)
